traits.name: Endless
traits.description: For every unit slot spent on Flock, you may summon an additional flock unit in free space adjacent to an allied unit at the end of every round.

abilities.name: Bloodletting
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Rip Apart (3+): ignoring armor.

abilities.name: Call to Feast
abilities.description: This unit gains 1 or (6+) 2 speed. It may then immediately spend two speed tokens to summon an additional Flock unit in an adjacent space.

upgrades.name: The Red Wet Hue
upgrades.description: Bloodletting gains Rip Apart (5+): and deal 1 curse damage again

upgrades.name: Blood Frenzy
upgrades.description: At round 5+, become immune to graze, line, and splash damage.

upgrades.name: Rabid
upgrades.description: This faction's dive bomb trait can be used for free on one flock unit a round.

traits.name: Long Stilts
traits.description: May move through walls, but not end its turn in one. When moving through a wall, gain free movement until end of turn.

abilities.name: Prepare the Pole
abilities.description: Effect: Step 2, then create a wall in a free adjacent space (4+) and gain 1 speed.

abilities.name: Hang for the Owls
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Rip Apart (3+): ignoring armor, Rip Apart (5+): then 1 damage again and summon a flock unit adjacent to target.

upgrades.name: Perching
upgrades.description: If starting turn adjacent to a wall, gain 1 speed and clear a negative token

upgrades.name: Writhing
upgrades.description: While adjacent to a wall, damage always ignores vitality and armor.

upgrades.name: Clinging
upgrades.description: While adjacent to a wall, is curseproof.

traits.name: Flight
traits.description: Ignores adverse terrain and elevation attack and movement penalties

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Effect: Target enemy unit always counts as having +2 of your units adjacent to it, even when alone. This effect lasts until this ability is used again or the Siren is slain.

abilities.name: Sonic Screech
abilities.description: Effects: Splash (self): 1 curse damage. Push all units one (5+) or two spaces.

abilities.name: Siren's Song
abilities.description: Effects: Until the start of this unit's next turn, while adjacent to this unit, enemy units take -1D on attacks, and self and allies are immune to graze damage

upgrades.name: Ear Splitter
upgrades.description: Sonic screech also grants one or two allies in the area 1 speed or strength.

upgrades.name: Painful Whispers
upgrades.description: Paranoia deals 1 curse damage, ignoring armor, but only counts as +1 adjacent unit

upgrades.name: Lullaby
upgrades.description: When Siren's Song expires, adjacent allies gain 1 speed.

traits.name: Feral Dodge
traits.description: May spend a speed token when attacked by an ACT ability to give the attacker -1D on the attack roll and step 1 after the ability resolves.

abilities.name: Disembowel
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Rip Apart (3+): +1 damage and gain 1 speed, Rip Apart (5+): and gain 1 strength and summon a Flock unit in free space adjacent to the target.

abilities.name: Raise Roost
abilities.description: Effect: Create a wall in range, then grant 1 speed to one (3+) or two, (5+) or all allied units to the wall.

abilities.name: Cannibalize
abilities.description: Effect: Slay an adjacent allied unit. This unit gains 1 strength, 1 speed, and may MOVE again

upgrades.name: Sinew
upgrades.description: At 1 hp or lower, this unit is immune to damage from grazes, lines, and splash effects

upgrades.name: Voracious
upgrades.description: Cannibalize can also be used on an enemy unit at 1 hp or lower, but does not grant tokens if used this way

upgrades.name: The Noose
upgrades.description: Raise Roost gains +1 range and when it creates a wall, it may first pull a unit in range 2 one space.

traits.name: Flesh Sacrifice
traits.description: Counts as two allies units for the purposes of Rip Apart, but not to itself.

abilities.name: Guzzle
abilities.description: On hit: 2 damage. Rip Apart (3+): +1 damage. Rip Apart (5+): +1 damage, and obliterate target if it is slain.

abilities.name: Fleshgorger
abilities.description: Splash (self): 1 damage. Then, for every unit slain, clear one token, and gain 1 speed or strength. Then, step 1 per unit slain, and may destroy walls during this movement.

abilities.name: Concussive Shriek
abilities.description: Splash (target): Deal 1 curse damage once, to a unit in the area for each wall in the area. The same unit can be targeted more than once.

upgrades.name: Machineheart
upgrades.description: When it first arrives, the Owl may slay all adjacent allied units, gaining 1 speed or strength for each.

upgrades.name: Sleek Owl
upgrades.description: The Owl becomes a 1x1 unit and gains free movement.

upgrades.name: Bone Resonance
upgrades.description: Concussive shriek also slays allied units in the area, counting each as a wall for purposes of the ability.

traits.name: Flesh Sacrifice
traits.description: Counts as two allies units for the purposes of Rip Apart, but not to itself.

abilities.name: The Knife
abilities.description: On hit: 1 damage. Rip Apart (3+): 1 damage again, (5+) and again, (7+) and again, (8+) and again.

soulAbilities.name: Call Flock
soulAbilities.description: Trigger: End of turn. Effect: Summon one, (4+) two, (6+) or three flock thralls in range.

soulAbilities.name: Fresh Meat
soulAbilities.description: Effect: Slay an allied unit in range. Up to three allies adjacent to the slain unit and self gain 1 strength and may clear a negative token.

upgrade.name: Red Communion
upgrade.description: Allied units may trigger 'slay unit' or 'slay allied unit' effects on you by dealing 1 devil damage to you instead.

upgrade.name: Slaughter Frenzy
upgrade.description: When an adjacent allied unit is slain, gain 1 strength. This effect can only trigger once a round.

upgrade.name: Priest of the Hue
upgrade.description: When an adjacent allied unit is slain, summon a flock unit in a free adjacent space. This effect can only trigger once a round.

upgrade.name: Bloody Haze
upgrade.description: Effect: Until start of this unit’s next turn, all attacks against self and all units adjacent to this unit ignore armor and grant the attacker 1 strength after they resolve.

upgrade.name: Flesh Hunt
upgrade.description: Effect: All allied units in range 2 of target foe are pushed 1 towards that foe (4+) and gain 1, (6+) or 2 strength.

upgrade.name: Call Watcher Owl
upgrade.description: Effect: Target a wall in range. That wall becomes immune to all damage, and counts as +1 ally for the purposes of Rip Apart. This ability lasts until used again.

upgrade.name: Darken Skies
upgrade.description: Effect: Until start of this unit’s next turn, cannot MOVE or step but self and adjacent allies gain cover from all directions and immunity to grazes.

upgrade.name: Bloody Rain
upgrade.description: Effect: Slay allied unit in range. Then summon a flock unit in range for every hp it is missing.

upgrade.name: The Hook
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 curse damage. Effect: Summon one or (5+) two flock units adjacent to the target.

upgrade.name: The Rope
upgrade.description: On hit: 1 damage, which cannot be reduced in any way. Effect: Then may pull self 2 towards a wall in range 3, or pull target 2 towards self or a wall in range 3.

upgrade.name: The Pole
upgrade.description: On hit: 2 damage. Effect: May step 2 after attack with free movement, and may pass through walls during this movement.

upgrade.name: Sudden Twitching
upgrade.description: Trigger: End of turn. Effect: Self or an allied unit in range gains 1 speed and steps 2. They may pass through walls during this step.

upgrade.name: Carrion Leap
upgrade.timing: Foe Turn, foe is in range 3.
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield. At the end of the triggering turn, place self in a free space adjacent to the triggering foe and gain 1 speed.

upgrade.name: Raptor Spasm
upgrade.description: Trigger: Self or ally in range is targeted by a line or splash effect. Effect: Reduce all damage taken by the targeted unit from the effect by 1 and the targeted unit becomes immune to any tokens or effects it would inflict.

upgrade.name: Impale
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn end. Effect: Place a wall in free space adjacent to a foe in range. Until the end of its next turn or until that wall is destroyed, that unit cannot break adjacency to the wall for any reason.

upgrade.name: Carrion Burial
upgrade.description: Trigger: Turn start. Effect: Summon a flock unit in free adjacent space to that unit. At the start of that unit’s turn for the rest of combat, repeat this effect. End this effect if the unit is slain or they become curseproof.

upgrade.name: Rapture of the Red Wet Hue
upgrade.description: Effect: For the rest of combat, all allied units double their MV stat, Dive Bomb can be used twice per round instead of just once, and units may deal 1 damage to an adjacent unit when they Dive Bomb.
